tidbits.title: Ancient Ruins
tidbits.description: Libya boasts ancient ruins like Leptis Magna and Sabratha, showcasing well-preserved Roman and Greek archaeological sites.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country offers diverse landscapes, including the Sahara Desert, Mediterranean coastline, and Jebel Akhdar's lush mountains.

tidbits.title: Recent Turbulence
tidbits.description: Libya has faced turmoil following the 2011 uprising, leading to political instability, conflict, and challenges in rebuilding the nation.
